trans-unit.target: TEXT_FESYKWMEDALEXCHANGE_00348_HINOSHIN_000_000<tab>A pleasure to see you again. Have you come to meet more Yo-kai? Or perhaps browse my array of special goods?
TEXT_FESYKWMEDALEXCHANGE_00348_HINOSHIN_100_000<tab>Well if it isn't the master weapons collector <var 08 E905 ((herself)) ((himself)) /var>! How may I be of service to you?
TEXT_FESYKWMEDALEXCHANGE_00348_Q1_000_001<tab>What would you like to do?
TEXT_FESYKWMEDALEXCHANGE_00348_A1_000_001<tab>Purchase minions.
TEXT_FESYKWMEDALEXCHANGE_00348_A1_000_002<tab>Purchase weapons.
TEXT_FESYKWMEDALEXCHANGE_00348_A1_000_003<tab>Small talk.
TEXT_FESYKWMEDALEXCHANGE_00348_A1_000_004<tab>Cancel.
TEXT_FESYKWMEDALEXCHANGE_00348_Q2_000_001<tab>Which minion will you choose? (Yo-kai Medals Required: <var 20 E802 /var>, Bag: <var 20 E803 /var>)
TEXT_FESYKWMEDALEXCHANGE_00348_A2_000_001<tab><var 28 ((Companion)) E80201 /var>.
TEXT_FESYKWMEDALEXCHANGE_00348_A2_000_002<tab>Cancel.
TEXT_FESYKWMEDALEXCHANGE_00348_Q6_000_001<tab>Choose this minion?
TEXT_FESYKWMEDALEXCHANGE_00348_A6_000_001<tab>Yes
TEXT_FESYKWMEDALEXCHANGE_00348_A6_000_002<tab>No

TEXT_FESYKWMEDALEXCHANGE_00348_HINOSHIN_000_002<tab>Why, you've befriended all the Yo-kai I've brought with me! Might it be said that you're quite taken by them? If so, I suggest you come and visit my homeland where you can find more. So many more.

TEXT_FESYKWMEDALEXCHANGE_00348_HINOSHIN_000_003<tab>Hmm... You appear to be lacking the required medals. Apologies, but business is business─I'll have to ask you to come back when you've found some more.
TEXT_FESYKWMEDALEXCHANGE_00348_SYSTEM_100_003<tab>Yo-kai Medals can be obtained by completing FATEs while equipped with the Yo-kai Watch.
TEXT_FESYKWMEDALEXCHANGE_00348_SYSTEM_200_003<tab>Yo-kai Medals can be found at FATEs in the following areas:

TEXT_FESYKWMEDALEXCHANGE_00348_SYSTEM_300_003<tab>The Black Shroud: Central, East, South, and North La Noscea: Middle, Lower, Western, Upper, and Outer Thanalan: Central, Western, Eastern, and Southern Coerthas Western Highlands, the Sea of Clouds, the Dravanian Forelands, the Churning Mists, and the Dravanian Hinterlands
TEXT_FESYKWMEDALEXCHANGE_00348_SYSTEM_400_003<tab>Azys Lla, the Fringes, the Peaks, the Lochs, the Ruby Sea, Yanxia, the Azim Steppe
TEXT_FESYKWMEDALEXCHANGE_00348_SYSTEM_000_004<tab>Unable to obtain <var 28 ((Item)) E80201 /var> due to insufficient inventory space or having already obtained the item.
TEXT_FESYKWMEDALEXCHANGE_00348_HINOSHIN_100_004<tab>Let's get you acquainted, then. Meet your new friend, <var 28 ((Companion)) E80201 /var>! I hope you two will get along!
TEXT_FESYKWMEDALEXCHANGE_00348_Q3_000_001<tab>Which weapon will you purchase?

TEXT_FESYKWMEDALEXCHANGE_00348_A3_000_001<tab><var 08 E4E802F23B68 ((Paladin's Sword)) ((<var 08 E4E802F23B69 ((Monk's Fists.)) ((<var 08 E4E802F23B6A ((Warrior's Axe.)) ((<var 08 E4E802F23B6B ((Dragoon's Spear.)) ((<var 08 E4E802F23B6C ((Bard's Bow.)) ((<var 08 E4E802F23B6D ((Ninja's Knives.)) ((<var 08 E4E802F23B6E ((Dark Knight's Claymore.)) ((<var 08 E4E802F23B6F ((Machinist's Musketoon.)) ((<var 08 E4E802F23B70 ((White Mage's Cane.)) ((<var 08 E4E802F23B71 ((Black Mage's Rod.)) ((<var 08 E4E802F23B72 ((Summoner's Grimoire.)) ((<var 08 E4E802F23B73 ((Scholar's Codex.)) ((<var 08 E4E802F23B74 ((Astrologian's Globe.)) (()) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var><var 08 E4E80301 (()) (( and Shield.)) /var> (<var 28 ((Item)) E80401 /var>: <var 20 E805 /var>/<var 20 E806 /var>)
TEXT_FESYKWMEDALEXCHANGE_00348_A3_000_002<tab>Cancel.
TEXT_FESYKWMEDALEXCHANGE_00348_Q5_000_001<tab>Purchase this weapon?
TEXT_FESYKWMEDALEXCHANGE_00348_A5_000_001<tab>Yes
TEXT_FESYKWMEDALEXCHANGE_00348_A5_000_002<tab>No

TEXT_FESYKWMEDALEXCHANGE_00348_HINOSHIN_000_005<tab>I'm afraid you'll have to come back when you acquire some Legendary Medals. I understand obtaining such rare pieces can be difficult, but think of the marvelous rewards you will reap for your efforts! I believe in you!

TEXT_FESYKWMEDALEXCHANGE_00348_SYSTEM_100_005<tab>Legendary Yo-kai Medals can be obtained, albeit at a low probability, by participating in FATEs designated in the Yo-kai Medallium while accompanied by the Yo-kai minion designated on the medal.

TEXT_FESYKWMEDALEXCHANGE_00348_SYSTEM_000_006<tab>Cannot obtain <var 28 ((Item)) E80201 /var> and <var 28 ((Item)) E80301 /var> due to insufficient inventory space or having already obtained the items.
TEXT_FESYKWMEDALEXCHANGE_00348_SYSTEM_100_006<tab>Cannot obtain <var 28 ((Item)) E80201 /var> due to insufficient inventory space or having already obtained the item.
TEXT_FESYKWMEDALEXCHANGE_00348_HINOSHIN_000_007<tab>Sword and shield, eh? That's my favorite kind. Here you are, your <var 28 ((Item)) E80201 /var> and <var 28 ((Item)) E80301 /var>.
TEXT_FESYKWMEDALEXCHANGE_00348_HINOSHIN_000_008<tab>Here you are, your new weapon! Go on, try it out!
TEXT_FESYKWMEDALEXCHANGE_00348_SYSTEM_000_009<tab>The number of Legendary Yo-kai Medals required to purchase Yo-kai weapons from Nohi has increased. Participate in FATEs to earn more medals.

TEXT_FESYKWMEDALEXCHANGE_00348_HINOSHIN_000_031<tab>Why did I choose to travel to Eorzea? Aside from business, I also came to visit a friend of mine. He's prone to wandering himself, but I always know when he's close by the jangling sound he makes when he walks.

TEXT_FESYKWMEDALEXCHANGE_00348_HINOSHIN_000_032<tab>Speaking of jangling, I found my coin pouch rather empty after I arrived at the Gold Saucer. I must have dropped some medals from my homeland when I made my way here after searching for Whisper.
TEXT_FESYKWMEDALEXCHANGE_00348_SYSTEM_000_033<tab>Yo-kai Medals can be obtained by completing FATEs while equipped with the Yo-kai Watch.
TEXT_FESYKWMEDALEXCHANGE_00348_SYSTEM_100_033<tab>Yo-kai Medals can be found at FATEs in the following areas:

TEXT_FESYKWMEDALEXCHANGE_00348_SYSTEM_200_033<tab>The Black Shroud: Central, East, South, and North La Noscea: Middle, Lower, Western, Upper, and Outer Thanalan: Central, Western, Eastern, and Southern Coerthas Western Highlands, the Sea of Clouds, the Dravanian Forelands, the Churning Mists, and the Dravanian Hinterlands
TEXT_FESYKWMEDALEXCHANGE_00348_SYSTEM_300_033<tab>Azys Lla, the Fringes, the Peaks, the Lochs, the Ruby Sea, Yanxia, the Azim Steppe

TEXT_FESYKWMEDALEXCHANGE_00348_SYSTEM_000_034<tab>Legendary Medals can be obtained, albeit at a low probability, by participating in FATEs in areas designated in the Yo-kai Medallium while accompanied by the Yo-kai minion designated on the medal.

TEXT_FESYKWMEDALEXCHANGE_00348_SYSTEM_100_034<tab>The Yo-kai Medallium can be accessed from the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Collection<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> menu or the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Minion Guide<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>.

TEXT_FESYKWMEDALEXCHANGE_00348_HINOSHIN_000_040<tab>This must be one of the finest exchanges I've had in my travels. I cannot recall the last time an adventurer purchased so many of my weapons. I must say I'm impressed!
TEXT_FESYKWMEDALEXCHANGE_00348_HINOSHIN_000_041<tab>Ah! It appears my old friend has come to visit me. Well, don't be shy, now! Come on over!
TEXT_FESYKWMEDALEXCHANGE_00348_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_042<tab>My apologies, Nohi. I did not want to intrude on what looked like a lively conversation between the two of you.

TEXT_FESYKWMEDALEXCHANGE_00348_HINOSHIN_000_043<tab>I'll say. <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> just finished acquiring thirteen of my finest weapons! Built <var 08 E905 ((herself)) ((himself)) /var> quite an arsenal, <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> did!
TEXT_FESYKWMEDALEXCHANGE_00348_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_044<tab>Thirteen!? Well then, allow me to extend my congratulations to you as well.
TEXT_FESYKWMEDALEXCHANGE_00348_HINOSHIN_000_045<tab>It must have been as tedious as taming a warlion. I can imagine how thrilled you must feel, having obtained long sought-after rewards.

TEXT_FESYKWMEDALEXCHANGE_00348_HINOSHIN_100_045<tab>Yes indeed, tantalizing rewards, for adventurers who throw themselves headfirst into the heat of <var 1A 02 /var>savage<var 1A 01 /var> battles. Wouldn't you agree, my minstrel friend?

TEXT_FESYKWMEDALEXCHANGE_00348_WANDERINGMINSTREL_200_045<tab>W─Wait just a moment, we need not discuss such complicated matters now. After all, we are in the midst of celebrating <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> achievement, are we not?

TEXT_FESYKWMEDALEXCHANGE_00348_HINOSHIN_000_046<tab>Indeed. It's a shame my stay in Eorzea is only temporary. I'm rather curious to see what becomes of your story. Rather, on behalf of my company, I would like to─
TEXT_FESYKWMEDALEXCHANGE_00348_WANDERINGMINSTREL_100_046<tab>Right, have fun, you two!
TEXT_FESYKWMEDALEXCHANGE_00348_HINOSHIN_200_046<tab>Hey, come back here! I still have some affairs to speak with you about! Hmph. He's always so elusive when I mention the savagery of combat.

TEXT_FESYKWMEDALEXCHANGE_00348_HINOSHIN_300_046<tab>Nevertheless, I was saying perhaps we can go on an adventure on our own somewhere in the future. As friends! Until then, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.
TEXT_FESYKWMEDALEXCHANGE_00348_PROG_DUMMY_001<tab>Purchase weapons (DoW).
TEXT_FESYKWMEDALEXCHANGE_00348_PROG_DUMMY_002<tab>Purchase weapons (DoM).

TEXT_FESYKWMEDALEXCHANGE_00348_PROG_DUMMY_003<tab><var 08 E4E802F23B68 ((Paladin's Sword)) ((<var 08 E4E802F23B69 ((Monk's Fists.)) ((<var 08 E4E802F23B6A ((Warrior's Axe.)) ((<var 08 E4E802F23B6B ((Dragoon's Spear.)) ((<var 08 E4E802F23B6C ((Bard's Bow.)) ((<var 08 E4E802F23B6D ((Ninja's Knives.)) ((<var 08 E4E802F23B6E ((Dark Knight's Claymore.)) ((<var 08 E4E802F23B6F ((Machinist's Musketoon.)) ((<var 08 E4E802F23B70 ((White Mage's Cane.)) ((<var 08 E4E802F23B71 ((Black Mage's Rod.)) ((<var 08 E4E802F23B72 ((Summoner's Grimoire.)) ((<var 08 E4E802F23B73 ((Scholar's Codex.)) ((<var 08 E4E802F23B74 ((Astrologian's Globe.)) ((<var 08 E4E802F27857 ((Samurai's Katana.)) ((<var 08 E4E802F27858 ((Red Mage's Rapier.)) ((<var 08 E4E802F27859 ((Gunbreaker's Gunblade.)) ((<var 08 E4E802F2785A ((Dancer's Chakrams.)) (()) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var><var 08 E4E80301 (()) (( and Shield.)) /var> (<var 28 ((Item)) E80401 /var>: <var 20 E805 /var>/<var 20 E806 /var>)

TEXT_FESYKWMEDALEXCHANGE_00348_HINOSHIN_000_061<tab>My word! It seems you have claimed one of each of the weapons I have on offer. I cannot imagine how you could possibly carry such an arsenal, let alone actually use it, but I feel congratulations are in order.
TEXT_FESYKWMEDALEXCHANGE_00348_HINOSHIN_000_062<tab>And it would appear that another unlikely event is about to unfold, for my friend the minstrel has returned from his wandering.

TEXT_FESYKWMEDALEXCHANGE_00348_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_063<tab>I do hope I am not interrupting your celebrations...but am I to understand that someone has at last collected a full set of those charming instruments of destruction? A fine achievement, even if only for achievement's sake.
TEXT_FESYKWMEDALEXCHANGE_00348_HINOSHIN_000_064<tab>To have done so in such a short span of time is commendable indeed. Perhaps I should have charged more for them?
TEXT_FESYKWMEDALEXCHANGE_00348_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_065<tab>If you had, I have no doubt this fine young adventurer would have risen to the challenge regardless.
TEXT_FESYKWMEDALEXCHANGE_00348_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_066<tab>But rather than speak on your behalf, mayhap you might share your thoughts on this momentous undertaking?
TEXT_FESYKWMEDALEXCHANGE_00348_Q7_000_067<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_FESYKWMEDALEXCHANGE_00348_A7_000_068<tab>Collecting a load of superfluous knickknacks is what I do best!
TEXT_FESYKWMEDALEXCHANGE_00348_A7_000_069<tab>I feel my efforts were amply rewarded.
TEXT_FESYKWMEDALEXCHANGE_00348_A7_000_070<tab>I'd rather scrub a behemoth's backside than do that again...
TEXT_FESYKWMEDALEXCHANGE_00348_HINOSHIN_000_071<tab>Most admirable! And for what it's worth, it was an honor to supply you with said knickknacks.
TEXT_FESYKWMEDALEXCHANGE_00348_HINOSHIN_000_072<tab>In which case, I can rest assured that the challenge I set was both fair and worthwhile for all involved.

TEXT_FESYKWMEDALEXCHANGE_00348_HINOSHIN_000_073<tab>Well, I daresay it was character-building in some way. After all, a bit of seemingly pointless drudgery never killed anyone. Or at least I don't think it did...
TEXT_FESYKWMEDALEXCHANGE_00348_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_074<tab>In any case, the deed is done, and the time has come for me to bid you farewell. Until our paths next cross, adventurer!
TEXT_FESYKWMEDALEXCHANGE_00348_HINOSHIN_000_075<tab>Where might his wandering take him next, I, ah...wonder.

TEXT_FESYKWMEDALEXCHANGE_00348_HINOSHIN_000_076<tab>Like him, you are also not wont to stay in one place overlong. I pray that when next we meet, we might have some new tales to share. Take care, my friend.
TEXT_FESYKWMEDALEXCHANGE_00348_A1_000_005<tab>Purchase framer's kit.
TEXT_FESYKWMEDALEXCHANGE_00348_SYSTEM_000_077<tab>The <var 31 ((Item)) 04F2A3450202 /var> costs <var 22 E802 ((,)) /var> MGP.
TEXT_FESYKWMEDALEXCHANGE_00348_Q8_000_001<tab>Purchase <var 31 ((Item)) 03F2A3450202 /var> for <var 22 E802 ((,)) /var> MGP? You currently possess <var 22 E803 ((,)) /var>.
TEXT_FESYKWMEDALEXCHANGE_00348_SYSTEM_000_078<tab>Unable to obtain <var 31 ((Item)) 03F2A3450202 /var>. You already have received one.
TEXT_FESYKWMEDALEXCHANGE_00348_SYSTEM_000_079<tab>Unable to obtain <var 31 ((Item)) 03F2A3450202 /var> due to insufficient inventory space or having already obtained the item.

TEXT_FESYKWMEDALEXCHANGE_00348_HINOSHIN_000_080<tab>Terribly sorry, but this prize is meant only for those who have befriended each and every Yo-kai. If you wish to earn it, you can start by gathering Yo-kai Medals and growing your circle of companions!

TEXT_FESYKWMEDALEXCHANGE_00348_HINOSHIN_000_081<tab>You have proven yourself a loyal friend to Yo-kai of all shapes and sizes, and for that, you deserve this. A singular gift to reward your singular devotion!
TEXT_FESYKWMEDALEXCHANGE_00348_SYSTEM_000_082<tab>Insufficient MGP. <var 22 E802 ((,)) /var> MGP is needed to complete the purchase.
